# bsb-neuron

bsb-neuron is a plugin of the [BSB](https://github.com/dbbs-lab/bsb). 
It contains the interfaces and tools to simulate BSB circuit with the 
[neuron simulator](https://www.neuron.yale.edu/neuron/).
